00029 #import "GHUIView+Utils.h"
00030 
00031 
00032 @implementation UIView (GHUtils)
00033 
00034 - (NSInteger)gh_removeAllSubviews {
00035   NSInteger subviewCount = [self.subviews count];
00036   for(UIView *subview in self.subviews) {
00037     [subview removeFromSuperview];
00038   }
00039   return subviewCount;
00040 }
00041 
00042 - (void)gh_setHeight:(CGFloat)height {
00043   CGPoint origin = self.frame.origin;
00044   CGSize size = self.frame.size;
00045   self.frame = CGRectMake(origin.x, origin.y, size.width, height);
00046 }
00047 
00048 - (void)gh_setWidth:(CGFloat)width {
00049   CGPoint origin = self.frame.origin;
00050   CGSize size = self.frame.size;
00051   self.frame = CGRectMake(origin.x, origin.y, width, size.height);
00052 }
00053 
00054 - (void)gh_setSize:(CGSize)size {
00055   CGPoint origin = self.frame.origin;
00056   self.frame = CGRectMake(origin.x, origin.y, size.width, size.height); 
00057 }
00058 
00059 - (void)gh_moveTo:(CGPoint)origin {
00060   CGSize size = self.frame.size;
00061   self.frame = CGRectMake(origin.x, origin.y, size.width, size.height); 
00062 }
00063 
00064 - (UIView *)gh_setSizeToView:(UIView *)view {
00065   CGSize size = view.frame.size;
00066   self.frame = CGRectMake(0, 0, size.width, size.height);
00067   return self;
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 @end
